content.value: Public Sub New(publicClientApplication As IPublicClientApplication, logger As ILogger(Of MsalPublicClientTokenAcquisition))

parameters.description: The MSAL public client application instance.
The logger to use for logging information and errors.

children.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MsalPublicClientTokenAcquisition class. Requires an instance of IPublicClientApplication, which is the entry point for using MSAL, and a logger for logging activities and errors.

content.value: Public Function AcquireTokenInteractiveAsync(scopes As IEnumerable(Of String)) As Task(Of AuthenticationResult)

parameters.description: The scopes for which the token is requested.

return.description: A task representing the asynchronous operation and returning the authentication result.

children.summary: Attempts to acquire a token interactively for the specified scopes.

return.description: A task representing the asynchronous operation and returning the authentication result.

content.value: Public Function GetAccountsAsync(userFlow As String = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of IAccount))

children.summary: Returns all the available accounts in the user token cache for the application.
